title: Win the Nosferatu Soundtrack by Robin Carolan on Vinyl
description: Succumb to the dark sounds of Robert Eggers' new film. Win the Nosferatu Soundtrack by Robin Carolan on Vinyl Consequence Staff
author: Consequence Staff
excerpt: Robin Carolan composed the score for the Robert Eggers movie Nosferatu, and you can now win the soundtrack on vinyl courtesy of Consequence.
text: Robert Eggers’ sumptuously-made Nosferatu is the spookiest movie premiering this Christmas. Given how meticulously it works to recreate the past, a vinyl release of its soundtrack feels more than fitting. So here’s your chance to win the two-record release, featuring the score by Robin Carolan (who previously collaborated with Eggers on The Northman). Nosferatu adapts the classic story of Dracula (through the lens of the 1922 film of the same name) for a gothic romance that doesn’t skimp on the blood and rats. Lily-Rose Depp stars as the tormented Ellen, whose husband (Nicholas Hoult) travels to a remote castle in Transylvania where the mysterious Count Orlok (Bill Skargard) awaits. The cast also includes Williem Dafoe as Van Helsing stand-in Prof. Albin Eberhart Von Franz, Aaron Taylor-Johnson s Friedrich Harding, and Emma Corrin as Anna Harding. Get a look at the complete Nosferatu (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack) vinyl package — which includes a Nosferatu Contract Poster — below. Enter using the widget ahead (or by heading here) for your chance* to win by midnight ET on Friday, December 13th. Nosferatu is in theaters this Christmas. Win the Nosferatu Soundtrack by Robin Carolan on Vinyl Winner must be based in the US. Entry requires enrollment in the Consequence newsletter.

Given how meticulously it works to recreate the past, a vinyl release of its soundtrack feels more than fitting. So here’s your chance to win the two-record release, featuring the score by Robin Carolan (who previously collaborated with Eggers on The Northman).

Nosferatu adapts the classic story of Dracula (through the lens of the 1922 film of the same name) for a gothic romance that doesn’t skimp on the blood and rats. Lily-Rose Depp stars as the tormented Ellen, whose husband (Nicholas Hoult) travels to a remote castle in Transylvania where the mysterious Count Orlok (Bill Skargard) awaits. Win the Nosferatu Soundtrack by Robin Carolan on Vinyl

Winner must be based in the US. Entry requires enrollment in the Consequence newsletter.
